verses.name: Micah 3:1
verses.text: And I said, Hear, I pray you, O heads of Jacob, and ye princes of the house of Israel; Is it not for you to know judgment?

verses.name: Micah 3:2
verses.text: Who hate the good, and love the evil; who pluck off their skin from off them, and their flesh from off their bones;

verses.name: Micah 3:3
verses.text: Who also eat the flesh of my people, and flay their skin from off them; and they break their bones, and chop them in pieces, as for the pot, and as flesh within the caldron.
